```{r}
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
df <- read_csv("downloads-per-day.csv")
df <- df %>% mutate(date = as.Date(date))

ggplot(df, aes(x = date, y = downloads, colour = version)) +
  geom_point() + 
  labs(title = "Downloads per day",
       x = "Date",
       y = "Downloads")
```
